I've corrected the code review items via @rehandalal , and also corrected an issue where URLs such as `/recipes/:pk/edit` would not link correctly in breadcrumbs. Crumbs would link to `/recipes/:pk` instead of `/recipes/123`, for instance.

@rehandalal Ready for a final review
